Articles.Content: Would it be nice to see some LEGO KSP sets? Like a LEGO version of the Kerbal X, or a big 'every child wants for Christmas/birthday' set of the Kerbal Space Center? What's your thoughts on this?

What Lego should or shouldn't do isn't really up to us. I would like to see more space themed sets in general, though. 

Licensing KSP may not be the easiest thing, and whether or not they'd do it would depend on if they get any money off of it. Would be cool, for sure.
I would find that building things would be even more difficult then the average Lego set in stability (something that works in ksp would fall or be prone to falling after moving slightly

17 hours ago, munlander1 said:

I would find that building things would be even more difficult then the average Lego set in stability (something that works in ksp would fall or be prone to falling after moving slightly 

Well if Lego made a set of the Saturn V, then they can make a set of the Kerbal X. I'm imagining a 'Jeb's First Rocket' set, with an SRB and a Mk1 Command Pod.

Just now, DeltaDizzy said:

DOTHISNOW

As in Lego releasing sets? Please explain

4 minutes ago, The_Cat_In_Space said:

Well if Lego made a set of the Saturn V, then they can make a set of the Kerbal X.

The Saturn V is a tad more iconic than the Kerbal X.

Just now, Gaarst said:

The Saturn V is a tad more iconic than the Kerbal X.

Yes. I was pointing out that building a Lego Kerbal X is not as near enough challenging as building a Saturn V (which they have already done).
Oh my god... Greatest. Idea. Ever

I suspect that Lego is going to be very conservative for the next couple of years. They just announced that they are laying off 8% of their global workforce (1400 jobs) in response to poor sales figures. Ref. https://www.nytimes.com/2017/09/05/business/lego-sales-toys.html, (or if you consider The New York Times to be "fake news", Ref. http://www.foxbusiness.com/markets/2017/09/05/lego-to-cut-8-percent-its-staff-as-sales-drop.html)
Look here, it has already been made  :http://steamcommunity.com/app/220200/images/?searchText=Lego&browsefilter=toprated&filterLanguage=default

Wasn't there some kind of vote or kickstarter type thing a few years ago for exactly this? Nothing ever came of it I guess.

 

I remember having some wonderful lego sets of the Saturn V, the ISS and maybe the space shuttle as well. It would be nice for them to bring something like that back rather than be some KSP licensed stuff.
Remember all the cool old lego sets? And then you could never get them all in time before there replaced by others
